title: System Freeze & Hang Fix
description: Resolve Windows unresponsiveness, UI hangs, and computer freezing during tasks.

steps.title: Hard Restart
steps.instruction: If completely frozen, hold the physical Power Button for 10 seconds to force a shutdown, then restart.

steps.title: Check for Disk Heavy Load
steps.instruction: A freezing UI is often caused by 100% Disk usage. Check Task Manager → Performance → Disk 0 (C:).

steps.title: Disable Background Apps
steps.instruction: Settings → Privacy → Background apps. Turn off apps that aren't needed to free up system interrupts.

steps.title: Run DISM Tool
steps.instruction: CMD as Admin → 'dism /online /cleanup-image /restorehealth'. This fixes deep system file corruption.

steps.title: Check for Malware
steps.instruction: Run a full scan with Windows Defender. Some malware consumes 100% resources causing frequent hangs.
